ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked tri-band GSM cell phone compatible with 900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE capabilities
2.0-megapixel camera and 8x digital zoom; Bluetooth for stereo music streaming; integrated music player, FM stereo radio, and video player
MicroSD memory expansion to 2 GB; organizer with calendar, to-do list, and notes
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 288 hours ( 12 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 3500 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera, Bluetooth Music, MP3 Player, MicroSD Slot--International Version with No Warranty (Gray)
